name: World Zombie War
description:
World Zombie War is a survival game based on a really breath-taking story. You will help Peter make life/death decisions.

The story: M city has become a zombie city because of the fast spreading of a biochemical virus named A. You are the only person Peter can rely on to protect his families and survive this world zombie war.

It’s a real time game, so you need to keep an eye on the game progress. We suggest you enable the notice feature to get Peter’s message in time.

There are more than one ending and you are the only person who can decide Peter’s faith. Are you the one whom Peter can trust?

I won’t tell you the whole story, you will need to discover by yourself.

Any suggestion please email us at: magicfantasyltd@hotmail.com
